title: Delete Project - CLI + API with cascade deletes
Test subscription flow - upgrade, downgrade, trial display
Implement payment processing for subscriptions
description:
When users start trialing the Unlimited plan, implement actual payment collection. Decision made during pricing page buildout - using 14-day trial to buy time before needing real payments.

## Context
- Pricing page now allows users to select plans and start 14-day trials
- Trial status is shown on pricing page (Trial ends in X days)
- Downgrade flow warns users they'll lose features and can't re-trial

## Implementation Plan
1. Integrate Stripe for payment processing
2. Add payment form/Stripe Elements to collect card details
3. Store Stripe customer ID and payment method
4. Handle trial-to-paid conversion (charge when trial ends)
5. Handle failed payments and subscription cancellation
6. Add billing history/invoices page
7. Implement subscription webhooks from Stripe

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Stripe integration set up (API keys, webhooks)
- [ ] Payment details collected before or during trial
- [ ] Automatic charging when trial ends
- [ ] Failed payment handling with grace period
- [ ] Users can update payment method
- [ ] Billing history viewable in dashboard
